fields.name: Passives:
fields.value:
- Defenses: The first time you run out of defense cards, immediately draw a random non-special defense. 
- Rollcall: Learn the number of the largest chain of true non-Order players there are on the playerlist. [Activates D2]

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Shields: Gain a Guard! or a random non-special defense card. [3 uses, 2 CD] 
- Advance: Choose a player. If they do not win with you, Attack! them. If they do win with you, Guard! an available attack on them. Activates end of phase, Influenceable. Gain a use every 3 players you outlive. [1 use, 2 CD, Recharging, 0/3]
- Train: Upgrade a card in your hand. [1 use, Unique, Unlocks D2]
